#include <iostream>
#include <stdint.h>
#include <vector>
#include <iomanip>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);

    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while(T --> 0)
    {
        int p;
        cin>> p;
        int j = p-1, numPoints = p;
        vector<int> lx;
        vector<int> ly;
        while (p --> 0)
        {
            int a;
            cin >> a;
            lx.push_back(a);
        }
        while(numPoints --> 0)
        {
            int b;
            cin >> b;
            ly.push_back(b);
        }
        int64_t pole = 0;
        for (int i=0; i<j; ++i)
        {
            pole = pole +  (lx[i+1]-lx[i]) * (ly[i]+ly[i+1]);
        }
        pole = pole+ (ly[j]+ly[0]) *(lx[0]-lx[j]);
        double le = (double)pole/2;
        cout << setprecision(1) << fixed << le << '\n';

    }



    return 0;
}
